Title: Successful login
Precondition (Given):
1. app is installed
2. I am on login page
Test Steps (When/And):
1. I input username "user"
2. I input password "pass"
Expected Result (Then/And):
1. I see dashboard
2. I see greeting

Title: Invalid login "case 1"
Precondition (Given):
1. app is installed
2. I am on login page
Test Steps (When/And):
1. I input username "user1"
2. I input password "wrong"

Title: Invalid login "case 2"
Precondition (Given):
1. app is installed
2. I am on login page
Test Steps (When/And):
1. I input username ""
2. I input password "pass"
